data.eml:eml: A new species of pontoniine shrimp genus Philarius Holthuis, 1952 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Palaemonidae) from the Great Barrier Reef of Australia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marin, Ivan (2012): A new species of pontoniine shrimp genus Philarius Holthuis, 1952 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Palaemonidae) from the Great Barrier Reef of Australia. Zootaxa 3182: 43-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.214307
